src/parallel/zsc-dgr-src/postcollision_f.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Copy inward f values from the real nodes into outward f values in the ghosts. These f values are required for the relaxation step in "stream.f".

MPI exchange is done using non-blocking receive and blocking send pairs (completed by a wait statement) in alternate directions to avoid deadlock. The components of f that need to be exchanged are packed into buffer arrays before the exchange.
